Name: Victoria
Description: Victoria is the capital and largest city of Seychelles, located on Mahé Island. It is known for its colonial architecture, markets, and as a hub for tourism.

Name: Beau Vallon
Description: Beau Vallon is a popular coastal area in Seychelles, known for its beautiful beach, resorts, and water sports activities.

Name: Anse Royale
Description: Anse Royale is a picturesque area on Mahé Island, known for its beach, clear waters, and popular tourist attractions.
